fields.headline: Ins and outs
fields.bodyText: Kate Barker, who carried out government reviews of the housing market and, last December, land-use planning, has been reappointed to the Bank of England's monetary policy committee. The NHS Confederation has appointed Steve Shrubb as director of its new Mental Health Network. He was formerly a regional director for the Care Services Improvement Partnership. Clive Grace has been appointed as chair of the Local Better Regulation office. He is chair of Supporta plc, a private public services provider, and is a former director general of the audit commission in Wales. The board of Sport England has appointed five additional members, including James Stewart, chief executive of Partnerships UK, and Mich Stevenson, chair of the Galleries of Justice Museum. Sean Harriss is the new chief executive of Bolton Metropolitan borough council, following the retirement of Bernard Knight. Harriss was formerly executive director of strategy and resources at Oldham council. Rochdale Development Agency has appointed Phil Joyce as director of physical regeneration. Joyce joins from Leeds council, where he was head of regeneration projects and programmes.
